summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5980 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 17, Denny Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between Franklin Avenue and Boylston Avenue North, from Edgar Street to Hamlin Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 80053, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
